scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Blogs_BlogPostByline_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
$core_v2_page.AddLink('stylesheet', $core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('style.less'), "%{ Position = 'AfterTheme' }") #set ($accessingUserIsRegistered = $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id)) #set ($blogPost = $core_v2_blogPost.Current) #if(!$blogPost) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end
#if ($blogPost.Author.ProfileUrl) $core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($blogPost.Author.AvatarUrl, 80, 80, "%{border='0px', alt=$blogPost.Author.DisplayName, ResizeMethod = 'ZoomAndCrop' }") #else $core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($blogPost.Author.AvatarUrl, 80, 80, "%{border='0px', alt=$blogPost.Author.DisplayName, ResizeMethod = 'ZoomAndCrop' }") #end
#if ($blogPost.Author.ProfileUrl) $blogPost.Author.DisplayName #else $blogPost.Author.DisplayName #end
$core_v2_language.FormatDate($blogPost.PublishedDate)
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:Blogs_BlogPostByline_Name}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Blogs_BlogPostByline_Description">Displays a blog post's byline.</resource> <resource name="Blogs_BlogPostByline_Name">Blog - Post Byline</resource> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> </language>
